body_html: @soumith Honestly I am surprised. Whole bunch of people used nngraph in Torch to build their models in the past and I'm surprised that PyTorch has no functionality to convert such models. I hope there is no assumption that people never want to load their nngraph-built models in PyTorch. Please advice!

body: @soumith Honestly I am surprised. Whole bunch of people used nngraph in Torch to build their models in the past and I'm surprised that PyTorch has no functionality to convert such models. I hope there is no assumption that people never want to load their nngraph-built models in PyTorch. Please advice!
